paper_abstract: This correspondence is concerned with the robust stability for a class of impulsive switched systems under the LQ guaranteed cost control. Some results on robust stability for this class of impulsive switched systems are obtained. Sufficient conditions for the existence of a guaranteed cost control law are also given. Subject to these sufficient conditions, the closed-loop uncertain impulsive switched system under the guaranteed cost control law is robustly stable with a guaranteed cost value.
paper_title: Robust stability analysis of guaranteed cost control for impulsive switched systems
